entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:04 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 1:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
